commit message: Added tag 1.0.1 for changeset cb7b46d5ed08
Add doc stub
Don't set auto complete flag on word input field
Remove fling and long press gesture detection - it breaks article view in Android 2.x (see issue 3)
Display 'Next Article' button at the bottom right corner of article view
Display 'Next Article' button for few seconds after motion event's move action (similar to scrollbars)
Scroll to 0,0 explicitely if no section is specified - in Android 2.2 WebView preserves scroll positions on loading new data
Make application debuggable
Revise back/next UI: remove menu items, use different icon for 'Next', don't use animation on Android 1.x (it's broken there)

Revise application startup flow so that dictionary discovery is not
run automatically (see issue 1).

Now the application will simply open previously opened
dictionaries. If none were open user will be presented with
Dictionaries activity to initiate SD card scan to find dictionaries
before proceeding to Lookup activity.

This should also fix intermittent search box breakage (see issue 2)
which appears to have been the result of looking for/loading
dictionaries progress dialogs popping up and stealing focus from the
search box at a bad moment.
Don't set article body margin to 0 in css - leaves it up to WebView to set up some small margin, makes it easier to read
Do not hide pre:empty elements - this does not properly work in WebKit, hides all <pre>
Make clear button same height as word lookup input field
Revise implementation startup implementation.
Preserve article view scale
Load more results automatically when result list is scrolled so that the last item appears on the screen

Don't use fade-in animation for Next button - for some reason it makes it hard to get onto screen with some articles, especially ones with no scroll, user has to touch screen multiple times for it to appear
Remove unused imports
Enable installing on SD card
bump version
